<b>Activate</b>: Harness the strength of the forest and support your army of humans with extra health and mobility. Establish a foothold near a Faeria well, then dash toward the orb!
The ogres march menacingly down from the mountains. Assail your opponent with their massive forms, then finish the job with fire.
Make a splash with the power of events! Use jumping creatures and aquatic fish to harvest from multiple Faeria wells at once. Strike your opponent when the time is right.

Savor the dark delights of the desert. Practice forbidden rituals and gain power from the death of your own creatures. Use your own life as a resource to gain an advantage over your opponent and consume their orb.
Let your greed for collecting more Faeria empower you. Focus on harvesting from enemy wells, and your massive colossi become cheaper with each gathering.
Crush your enemies, see them driven before you, and hear the lamentations of the yaks. Command an army that thrives in combat. The Gift of Steel shines brightest in times of war.
Show no mercy. Head directly for your opponent and attack their orb at all costs, empowering your Zealous Crusaders in the process.
Strike a bargain with the ogres and play these expensive cards at a fraction of their normal cost. Unleash Dragons and Behemoths to reap epic victories.
Command the skies. Your aviaries will bolster the strength of your flying armada. Soar to the heart of the enemy and unleash death from above.
The forest is not always so patient. Strike out for the orb and clear a path for your God Hunters to seek their natural prey: your enemy's face.

Swallow: Imprisons a creature inside this. When this dies, the creature is released (you can't swallow a creature which swallowed another one).
Wild: A card is wild when all the lands it requires are wild.
